mapper.sql: ID, SERIAL_NO, ACTIVE, WAYBILL_NO, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, BILL_TIME, OLD_SERIAL_NO, NUMBER_CHANG_ITEMS, INITIAL_VALUE, IS_NEED_WOODEN,PACKAGE_TYPE
mapper.select:
select /*模块：接送货-运单-通过运单号查询所有激活流水号*/
from PKP.T_SRV_LABELED_GOOD where WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ACTIVE = 'Y' order by serial_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into PKP.T_SRV_LABELED_GOOD (ID, SERIAL_NO, ACTIVE, WAYBILL_NO, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, BILL_TIME, OLD_SERIAL_NO, NUMBER_CHANG_ITEMS, INITIAL_VALUE, IS_NEED_WOODEN,Package_type) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oldSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberChangItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{initalVale,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isNeedWooden,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{packageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update PKP.T_SRV_LABELED_GOOD
SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BILL_TIME = #{billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OLD_SERIAL_NO = #{oldSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUMBER_CHANG_ITEMS = #{numberChangItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INITIAL_VALUE = #{initalVale,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_NEED_WOODEN = #{isNeedWooden,jdbcType=CHAR},
PACKAGE_TYPE = #{packageType,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PKP.T_SRV_LABELED_GOOD set SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BILL_TIME = #{billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OLD_SERIAL_NO = #{oldSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUMBER_CHANG_ITEMS = #{numberChangItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INITIAL_VALUE = #{initalVale,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_NEED_WOODEN = #{isNeedWooden,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
